Html:
Hi,
This is a great tool and I'm really excited about using it. I think it's just what SharePoint needs to get the 'messy' data into something to code against.

When I run spmetal against a document library I get the the following error:

Failed to generate spml. Cannot load the list definition for docs

The library is a document library. (Perhaps it does not support doc libs?)

Does anyone know what this error is caused by?
Thanks

I have the same issue... does any =one confirm this tool will not work with Doc library??

 

Thanks

P
